img_text: LIVE A spatula...cant think of anything useful for this one. A cheese grater...hmm. I haue a joke for this one. What did the blind man say after being handed a cheese grater? "That's the most uiolent book l'ue euer read" Ha ha! So funny Opss.. hope you're not one of of those SJW. It's just a harmless joke STAYED 08 28 85
